Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController

Class EndingSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController.GenericController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController.EndingSceneController
public class EndingSceneController extends GenericController
Controller for the ending scene displaying game results.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by hiding labels for second, third, and fourth place players.

    • changeWinnersLabel

      public void changeWinnersLabel(Map<String,Integer> scoreBoard)
      Updates the labels to display the winners and their scores based on the provided score board. It sorts the score board by score in descending order and displays the winners in the appropriate labels.
      Parameters:
      scoreBoard - a map containing player usernames as keys and their scores as values
